mapper.sql: id as id , platformId as platformId , openId as openId , unionId as unionId , createTime as createTime , userId as userId , status as status
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO power_user_platform ( platformId, openId, unionId, createTime, userId, status ) VALUES ( #{platformId}, #{openId}, #{unionId}, #{createTime}, #{userId}, #{status} )

INSERT INTO power_user_platform ( platformId, openId, unionId, createTime, userId, status ) VALUES ( #{map.platformId}, #{map.openId}, #{map.unionId}, #{map.createTime}, #{map.userId}, #{map.status} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE power_user_platform
platformId = #{platformId},
openId = #{openId},
unionId = #{unionId},
createTime = #{createTime},
userId = #{userId},
status = #{status},
WHERE id = #{id}

platformId = #{map.platformId},
openId = #{map.openId},
unionId = #{map.unionId},
createTime = #{map.createTime},
userId = #{map.userId},
status = #{map.status},
WHERE id = #{map.id}

UPDATE power_user_platform
platformId = #{update.platformId},
openId = #{update.openId},
unionId = #{update.unionId},
createTime = #{update.createTime},
userId = #{update.userId},
status = #{update.status},
${nativeSql}
